Built in 1890 , this house once belonged to the family of Yahya Khan , the third president of Pakistan .
Time has left its mark on the Yahya family house , but the residual grandeur of the rich architecture is still awe - inspiring .
The house was owned by Yahya 's grandfather Ghulam Haider Khan .
Later Rahat Ali Khan , an uncle of Yahya , inherited it from his father .
Saadat Ali Khan , Yahya Khan 's father , got another house in the same lane that has already been razed to the ground .
